trans-unit.source: Arranges and virtualizes content on a single line that is oriented either horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: Dispõe e Virtualiza conteúdo numa única linha que está orientado na horizontal ou verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control.
trans-unit.target: O sistema de esquema padrão cria item contentores e calcula o esquema para cada item associada a um controlo de lista.

trans-unit.source: The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen.
trans-unit.target: A palavra "virtualizar" refere-se a uma técnica através do qual um subconjunto de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elementos são gerados a partir de um grande número de itens de dados com base nos quais os itens estão visíveis no ecrã.

trans-unit.source: Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application.
trans-unit.target: Gerar muitos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elementos ao poderão ser apenas de alguns elementos no ecrã podem afetar negativamente o desempenho da sua aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The VirtualizingStackPanel calculates the number of visible items and works with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> from an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> (such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements only for visible items.
trans-unit.target: O VirtualizingStackPanel calcula o número de itens visíveis e funciona com o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator>de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>(tais como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) para criar [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elementos apenas para itens visíveis.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator>

trans-unit.source: Virtualization in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> only occurs when the items control contained in the panel creates its own item containers.
trans-unit.target: Virtualização num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>só ocorre quando o controlo de itens contido no painel de cria as suas próprias contentores de item.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can ensure this happens by using data binding.
trans-unit.target: Pode certificar-se de que isto acontece, utilizando o enlace de dados.

trans-unit.source: In scenarios where item containers are created and added to the items control, a VirtualizingStackPanel offers no performance advantage over a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Em cenários onde os contentores de item são criadas e adicionadas ao controlo de itens, um VirtualizingStackPanel não oferece nenhuma vantagem de desempenho através de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: VirtualizingStackPanel is the default items host for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> element.
trans-unit.target: VirtualizingStackPanel é o anfitrião de itens predefinido para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing%2A> is set to `false`, a VirtualizingStackPanel behaves the same as an ordinary <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing%2A>está definido como `false`, um VirtualizingStackPanel comporta-se o mesmo que um comum <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.CleanUpVirtualizedItem> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.CleanUpVirtualizedItem>anexados a eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.CleanUpVirtualizedItem>

trans-unit.source: The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control.
trans-unit.target: O sistema de esquema padrão cria item contentores e calcula o esquema para cada item associada a um controlo de lista.

trans-unit.source: The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen.
trans-unit.target: A palavra "virtualizar" refere-se a uma técnica através do qual um subconjunto de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elementos são gerados a partir de um grande número de itens de dados com base nos quais os itens estão visíveis no ecrã.

trans-unit.source: Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application.
trans-unit.target: Gerar muitos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elementos ao poderão ser apenas de alguns elementos no ecrã podem afetar negativamente o desempenho da sua aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> calculates the number of visible items and works with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> from an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> (such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements only for visible items.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>calcula o número de itens visíveis e funciona com o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator>de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>(tais como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) para criar [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elementos apenas para itens visíveis.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> that is listening for this event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref> que está à escuta para este evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler that is to be added.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos que está a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Dispõe o conteúdo de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: You can override the ArrangeOverrideand <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.MeasureOverride%2A> methods in a derived class for custom layout behavior.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir o ArrangeOverrideand <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.MeasureOverride%2A>métodos de uma classe derivada de comportamento do esquema personalizado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.MeasureOverride%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that this element should use to arrange its child elements.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> que este elemento deve utilizar para dispor os respetivos elementos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that represents the arranged size of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref> element and its child elements.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho desta forma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref> elemento e os respetivos elementos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: Generates the item at the specified index position and brings it into view.
trans-unit.target: Gera o item da posição de índice especificado e coloca-os em vista.

trans-unit.source: The position of the item to generate and make visible.
trans-unit.target: A posição do item para gerar e tornar visível.

trans-unit.source: The index position does not exist in the child collection.
trans-unit.target: O index posição não existe na coleção subordinada.

trans-unit.source: Gets value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref> can virtualize items that are grouped or organized in a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref> virtualizar itens que são agrupados ou organizados de uma hierarquia.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref> can scroll in the horizontal dimension.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref> pode desloque-se na dimensão horizontal.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if content can scroll in the horizontal dimension; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o conteúdo pode desloque-se na dimensão horizontal; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether content can scroll in the vertical dimension.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o conteúdo pode deslocar na dimensão vertical.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if content can scroll in the vertical dimension; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o conteúdo pode desloque-se na dimensão vertical; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.CleanUpVirtualizedItem> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.CleanUpVirtualizedItem>anexados a eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.CleanUpVirtualizedItem>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que contenha o tamanho de até ao limite vertical.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the vertical size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>que representa o tamanho de até ao limite vertical.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the horizontal size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que contenha o tamanho de até ao limite horizontal.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the horizontal size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>que representa o tamanho de até ao limite horizontal.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the specified item, relative to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a posição do item especificado, relativa a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The element whose position to find.
trans-unit.target: O elemento cuja posição localizar.

trans-unit.source: The position of the specified item, relative to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A posição do item especificado, relativo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates if this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref> has a vertical or horizontal orientation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref> tem uma orientação vertical ou horizontal.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `true` because a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> must have either a vertical or horizontal orientation.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve sempre `true` porque um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>tem de ter uma orientação vertical ou horizontal.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que contenha o deslocamento horizontal do conteúdo scrolled.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Double> that represents the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Double>que representa o deslocamento horizontal do conteúdo scrolled.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing*>ligado propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel.IsVirtualizing*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content downward by one logical unit.
trans-unit.target: Desloca conteúdos rapidez por uma unidade lógica.

trans-unit.source: You can override this method in a derived class to change how the stack panel scrolls content downward.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir este método de uma classe derivada para alterar a forma como o painel de pilha desloca rapidez conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can scroll content down by two units instead of one.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode desloque o conteúdo para baixo por duas unidades em vez de um.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se necessitar de deslocamento físico em vez de deslocamento lógica, moldar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>fornece o deslocamento e virtualização está desativado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content to the left by one logical unit.
trans-unit.target: Desloca o conteúdo para a esquerda por uma unidade lógica.

trans-unit.source: You can override this method in a derived class to change how the stack panel scrolls content downward.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir este método de uma classe derivada para alterar a forma como o painel de pilha desloca rapidez conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can scroll content down by two units instead of one.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode desloque o conteúdo para baixo por duas unidades em vez de um.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se necessitar de deslocamento físico em vez de deslocamento lógica, moldar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>fornece o deslocamento e virtualização está desativado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content to the right by one logical unit.
trans-unit.target: Desloca o conteúdo para a direita por uma unidade lógica.

trans-unit.source: You can override this method in a derived class to change how the stack panel scrolls content to the right.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir este método de uma classe derivada para alterar a forma como o painel de pilha desloca o conteúdo para a direita.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can scroll content right by two units instead of one.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, desloque o conteúdo direito pelas unidades de dois em vez de um.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se necessitar de deslocamento físico em vez de deslocamento lógica, moldar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>fornece o deslocamento e virtualização está desativado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content upward by one logical unit.
trans-unit.target: Desloca conteúdos para cima por uma unidade lógica.

trans-unit.source: You can override this method in a derived class to change how the stack panel scrolls content upward.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir este método de uma classe derivada para alterar a forma como o painel de pilha desloca o conteúdo para cima.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can scroll up two units instead of one.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode deslocar duas unidades em vez de um.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se necessitar de deslocamento físico em vez de deslocamento lógica, moldar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>fornece o deslocamento e virtualização está desativado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls to the specified coordinates and makes that portion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> visible.
trans-unit.target: Desloca para as coordenadas especificadas e faz com que parte de um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> visível.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that becomes visible.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> que fica visível.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the coordinate space within a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> que representa o espaço de coordenada dentro de um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that is visible.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> que está visível.

trans-unit.source: Measures the child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref> in anticipation of arranging them during the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.ArrangeOverride*> pass.
trans-unit.target: Mede os elementos subordinados de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref> no anticipation de arranging-los durante a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.ArrangeOverride*>pass.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.ArrangeOverride*>

trans-unit.source: When scrolling, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> does not grow in layout size, but effectively adds its descendants on a z-plane, which is normally clipped by a parent element (typically a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter>) to the size of the stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando o deslocamento, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>não aumentam de tamanho de esquema, mas adiciona eficazmente respetivos descendentes um z-plane, que está anexada normalmente por um elemento principal (normalmente uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter>) para o tamanho da pilha.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: An upper limit <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that should not be exceeded.
trans-unit.target: Um limite superior <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> que não deve ser excedido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that represents the desired size of the element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho do elemento pretendido.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically downward in response to a downward click of the mouse wheel button.
trans-unit.target: Desloca conteúdo logicamente rapidez em resposta a um descendente clique do botão de roda de rato.

trans-unit.source: You can override MouseWheelDown in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the mouse wheel down action.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir MouseWheelDown numa classe derivada para alterar a forma como o painel de pilha responde à roda do rato para baixo de ação.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se necessitar de deslocamento físico em vez de deslocamento lógica, moldar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>fornece o deslocamento e virtualização está desativado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically to the left in response to a left click of the mouse wheel button.
trans-unit.target: Desloca conteúdo logicamente para a esquerda em resposta a um left click do botão de roda de rato.

trans-unit.source: You can override MouseWheelLeft in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the mouse wheel left action.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir MouseWheelLeft numa classe derivada para alterar a forma como o painel de pilha responde à ação de esquerdo de roda de rato.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se necessitar de deslocamento físico em vez de deslocamento lógica, moldar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>fornece o deslocamento e virtualização está desativado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically to the right in response to a right click of the mouse wheel button.
trans-unit.target: Desloca conteúdo logicamente à direita em resposta a um right click do botão de roda de rato.

trans-unit.source: You can override MouseWheelRight in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the mouse wheel right action.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir MouseWheelRight numa classe derivada para alterar a forma como o painel de pilha responde para a ação de direito de roda de rato.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se necessitar de deslocamento físico em vez de deslocamento lógica, moldar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>fornece o deslocamento e virtualização está desativado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content logically upward in response to an upward click of the mouse wheel button.
trans-unit.target: Desloca conteúdo logicamente para cima em resposta a um ascendente clique do botão de roda de rato.

trans-unit.source: You can override MouseWheelUp in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the mouse wheel up action.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir MouseWheelUp numa classe derivada para alterar a forma como o painel de pilha responde a roda de rato ação.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se necessitar de deslocamento físico em vez de deslocamento lógica, moldar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>fornece o deslocamento e virtualização está desativado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Called when an item that is hosted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref> is re-virtualized.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando um item que está hospedado o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref> novamente é virtualizado.

trans-unit.source: The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control.
trans-unit.target: O sistema de esquema padrão cria item contentores e calcula o esquema para cada item associada a um controlo de lista.

trans-unit.source: The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen.
trans-unit.target: A palavra "virtualizar" refere-se a uma técnica através do qual um subconjunto de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elementos são gerados a partir de um grande número de itens de dados com base nos quais os itens estão visíveis no ecrã.

trans-unit.source: Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application.
trans-unit.target: Gerar muitos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elementos ao poderão ser apenas de alguns elementos no ecrã podem afetar negativamente o desempenho da sua aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> calculates the number of visible items and works with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> from an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> (such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements only for visible items.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>calcula o número de itens visíveis e funciona com o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator>de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>(tais como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>) para criar [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elementos apenas para itens visíveis.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Data about the event.
trans-unit.target: Dados sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when the collection of child elements is cleared by the base <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a coleção de elementos subordinados está desmarcada, a base de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>coleção que está associada a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref> para este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>gerado que o evento.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemsChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Called when the offset of the viewport changes as a user scrolls through content.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o deslocamento de janela viewport alterações como um utilizador desloca através de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Use this method, in a derived class, to detect and respond to changes in the viewport location.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método, numa classe derivada, para detetar e responder a alterações na localização janela viewport.

trans-unit.source: The old offset of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: O desvio antigo da janela viewport.

trans-unit.source: The new offset of the viewport
trans-unit.target: O desvio novo da janela viewport

trans-unit.source: Called when the size of the viewport changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o tamanho da janela viewport é alterado.

trans-unit.source: Use this method, in a derived class, to detect and respond to changes in the viewport size.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método, numa classe derivada, para detetar e responder a alterações no tamanho da janela viewport.

trans-unit.source: The old size of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho antigo da janela viewport.

trans-unit.source: The new size of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: O novo tamanho da janela viewport.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that describes the horizontal or vertical orientation of stacked content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que descreve a orientação horizontal ou vertical do conteúdo empilhada.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`||

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> of child content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref> de conteúdo subordinado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.Orientation*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.Orientation*>

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content downward by one page.
trans-unit.target: Desloca rapidez conteúdo por uma página.

trans-unit.source: You can override PageDown in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the page down action.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir PageDown numa classe derivada para alterar a forma como o painel de pilha responde para a página para baixo de ação.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.

trans-unit.target: Neste caso, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>fornece o deslocamento e virtualização está desativado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.target: Desloca o conteúdo para a esquerda por página.

trans-unit.target: Pode substituir PageLeft numa classe derivada para alterar a forma como o painel de pilha responde para a ação esquerdo da página.

trans-unit.target: Desloca o conteúdo para a direita por página.

trans-unit.target: Pode substituir PageRight numa classe derivada para alterar a forma como o painel de pilha responde para a ação de direito da página.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se necessitar de deslocamento físico em vez de deslocamento lógica, moldar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls content upward by one page.
trans-unit.target: Desloca para cima conteúdo por uma página.

trans-unit.source: You can override PageUp in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the page up action.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir PageUp numa classe derivada para alterar a forma como o painel de pilha responde para a página de ação.

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref> from which the handler is being removed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref> do que o processador está a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the event handler that is to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o processador de eventos que está a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that identifies the container that controls scrolling behavior in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que identifica o contentor que controla o comportamento de deslocamento deste <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control is the ScrollOwner, physical scrolling is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>controlo é o ScrollOwner, deslocamento física está ativada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel> is the ScrollOwner, scrolling is logical by child element.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>é ScrollOwner, deslocamento lógica pelo elemento subordinado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> that owns scrolling for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> que é proprietário de deslocamento para este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.HorizontalOffset*> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.HorizontalOffset*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.HorizontalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.HorizontalOffset*> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.HorizontalOffset*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.HorizontalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.VerticalOffset*> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.VerticalOffset*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.VerticalOffset*> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.VerticalOffset*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a changed item in an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> affects the layout for this panel.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se um item alterado num <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref> afeta o esquema para este painel.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the changed item is a direct child of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the changed item is an indirect descendant of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o item foi alterado é um subordinado direto <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o item foi alterado é um descendente indireta do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Contains data regarding the changed item.
trans-unit.target: Contém dados sobre o item foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the changed item in an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> affects the layout for this panel; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o item foi alterado num <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref> afeta o esquema para este painel; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que contenha o deslocamento vertical do conteúdo scrolled.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>que representa o deslocamento vertical do conteúdo scrolled.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical size of the viewport of the content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que contenha o tamanho da janela viewport do conteúdo vertical.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the vertical size of the viewport of the content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>que representa o tamanho da janela viewport do conteúdo vertical.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the horizontal size of the viewport of the content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que contenha o tamanho da janela viewport do conteúdo horizontal.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the vertical size of the viewport of the content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Double>que representa o tamanho da janela viewport do conteúdo vertical.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref uid="langword_csharp_VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode" name="VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode" href=""></xref> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref uid="langword_csharp_VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode" name="VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode" href=""> </xref> ligado propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
